definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Manasseh, W. of Jordan (place of quiet) 1Ki 4:12, 1Ki 4:12; [[בֵּית־שְׁאָן]] Jos 17:11, Jos 17:16, Ju Jdg 1:27, 1Ch 7:29; = [[בֵּית שָָׁן]] 1Sa 31:10, 1Sa 31:12; [[בֵּית־שַׁן]] 2Sa 21:12; —mod. Beisân (Scythopolis), NH [[בֵּישָׁן]] Rob:BR iii. 329 Bd:Pal 224 Survey:i. 101 f.
